newsitem.title: JAPAN: Building shares hit by Nichiei Finance liquidation.
newsitem.headline: Building shares hit by Nichiei Finance liquidation.

text.p: Shares in the construction sector were knocked lower on Tuesday morning after credit and financing company Nichiei Finance Co Ltd applied for liquidation, brokers said.

With the problem of non-bank financial institutions' bad loans coming to light, investors believe the bad loan problem of construction firms will emerge as they are major clients of non-banks, and this invited selling, brokers said.
By 0112 GMT, shares in Sato Kogyo Co Ltd had shed 13 yen to 581 yen, Fujita Corp had lost 10 yen to stand at 435 yen.
Taisei Corp was eight yen lower at 711 yen and Shimizu Corp was down 20 yen at 1,060 yen.
